title: Eritettix abortivus
text: Eritettix abortivus, known generally as the Texas short-winged slant-face grasshopper or Texas short-wing slantfaced grasshopper, is a species of slant-faced <a href="grasshopper">grasshopper</a> in the family <a href="Acrididae">Acrididae</a>. It is found in Central America and North America.
